title: OCE Streamer

embed.description: OCE]-HD- Plat 1 Mid Laner, Games with Viewers :D

body: Hey everyone, I'm here advertising one of my favourite streamer, he's an OCE streamer currently has a relatively small viewer base of around 15-25 people. He does do giveaways regularly, viewer games. He is currently Plat 1 and  was diamond 5 in the preseason. He speaks to his viewers unlike many big streamers that ignore chat. It would be appreciated if we could show some love.

replies.body: Thanks for the post man, couldn't do it without you guys
